data.title: Explore Best Hotels in Kuala Lumpur to Stay
data.meta_description: Plan your trip to Kuala Lumpur by discovering the top hotels for 2024, ranging from budget-friendly options to luxurious accommodations. Check out the facilities, location, cost, popular places Nearby and more.
data.text:
Best Hotels in Kuala Lumpur to Stay in 2024

TeamAckoJul 31, 2024

Are you planning to visit Kuala Lumpur this year? If you are, make sure to secure your accommodations in advance. Have you decided on where to stay yet? If not, this blog offers a comprehensive guide to the finest hotels in Kuala Lumpur, ranging from budget-friendly options to luxuriant stays. Take a look to find the perfect place for your trip.

Top 4 Budget-Friendly Hotels in Kuala Lumpur

Are you specifically on the hunt for budget hotels in Kuala Lumpur? Check out our curated list of hotels that offer affordability without compromising comfort or amenities. Pick the perfect place for your Kuala Lumpur adventure.

Scott Hotel Kuala Lumpur Sentral

Scott Hotel is one of the best cheap hotels in Kuala Lumpur that offers good quality accommodation with several amenities. It is a nine storied hotel which you can reach within 10 minutes by walk from the KL Sentral Station. You can easily access the city centre by metro or bus from Scott Hotel, which helps you explore the city without any worries.

Facilities Provided: Scottâ€™s cafe and sidewalk, room service, free wi-fi internet access, 24-hour reception services, laundry, extra bed/baby cot, complimentary guest parking, Surao, etc.

Location: No. 10, Jalan Tun Sambanthan, Brickfields, 50470 Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia

Cost: Rs. 1,569.06 per night approx.

Check-In and Check-Out Time: 2:00 p.m. and 12:00 p.m.

Popular Places Nearby: River of Life, Little India Brickfields, Arulmiku Sam Kow Tong Temple, Thean Hou Temple, Umbrella Walk, Tamil Methodist Church, Nu Sentral, Buddhist Maha Vihara, Mai Bar, etc.

Leo Palace

If you are looking for the best hotels in Kuala Lumpur that are also very affordable, Leo Palace must be included on the list. It is a 3-star hotel where guests can easily explore various popular and off-beat attractions of Kuala Lumpur. The hotel offers leisure and business travellers a refined and well-balanced experience via its facilities and services.

Facilities Provided: Rooftop pool, Leo Garden Cafe, wi-fi connection, 24-hour reception, luggage storage, secretarial services, cable and satellite TV services, concierge services, etc.

Location: 18, Jalan Rahmat, Off Jalan Sultan Azlan Shah (formerly known as Jalan Ipoh), 50350 Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.

Cost: Rs. 2,963.49 per night approx.

Check-In and Check-Out Time: 2:00 p.m. and 12:00 p.m.

Popular Places Nearby: Chinatown, National Mosque of Malaysia, Aquaria KLCC, Pasar Seni, Merdeka Square, Bukit Bintang, Suria KLCC, Titiwangsa Lake Gardens, Putra World Trade Centre, Petronas Twin Towers, Friday Mosque, etc.

Arenaa Star

Arenaa Star aims to offer a different kind of experience apart from providing the usual perks of staying in a good hotel. They mix their modern hotel with a cinematic theme to fashion a casual and fun setting where guests remember the joy of entertainment while enjoying the stay. It is one of the ideal places to stay in Kuala Lumpur for business and leisure visitors within a budget.

Facilities Provided: Wins Boulangerie & Restaurant, functions halls for meetings and events, fitness centre, domestic AC power plugs & sockets, complimentary wi-fi internet access, 24-hour reception, mini bar, laundry service, etc.

Location: 49-51, Jalan Hang Lekiu,Kuala Lumpur, 50100 Wilayah Persekutuan Malaysia

Cost: Rs. 1,589.83 per night approx.

Check-In and Check-Out Time: 2:00 p.m. and 12:00 p.m.

Popular Places Nearby: Bukit Bintang, KL Tower, Merdeka Square, National Monument, National Mosque, Jalan Masjid India, China Town, etc.

Ascott Star KLCC Kuala Lumpur

If you are looking for top hotels in Kuala Lumpur that offer high-end facilities and services while staying budget-friendly, Ascott Star can be the right choice. Being situated at the heart of Kuala Lumpur, it empowers guests to access the city's alluring appeals, its most celebrated attractions, and its persuasive mysteries.

Facilities Provided: 24-hour reception, rooftop restaurant, business centre services, rooftop swimming pool, gymnasium, reading lounge, yoga room, daily breakfast, wireless internet connectivity (Wi-fi), audio system, laundry and dry cleaning services, jacuzzi, etc.

Location: 1, Jalan Yap Kwan Seng, Kampung Baru, 50450 Kuala Lumpur, Wilayah Persekutuan Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia

Cost: Rs. 7,847.96 per night approx.

Check-In and Check-Out Time: 3 p.m. and 12:00 p.m.

Popular Places Nearby: Petronas Twin Brothers, Kuala Lumpur Tower, Aquaria KLCC, Saloma Link, Pavilion Kuala Lumpur, Thean Hou Temple, Kuala Lumpur City Centre, Jalan Alor, KLCC Park, etc.

4 Best Luxury Hotels in Kuala Lumpur in 2024

If you prefer luxurious experiences, consider our top picks for the most lavish and comfortable stays during your Kuala Lumpur vacation.

EQ Kuala Lumpur

EQ is a 52-story hotel offering environmentally conscious and ultramodern hospitality. It is the latest chapter in Hotel Equatorial's legacy, fittingly holding itself as one of the city's most iconic landmarks. Whether it is EQ's opulent amenities or stunning city views, the hotel will never fail to satisfy a traveller due to its exceptional hospitality.

Facilities Provided: Infinity swimming pool, sanctum fitness, sanctum spa, concierge service, Equator Club, Diamond Ballroom, Forum & Caucus (luxurious meeting space), Sapphire (function rooms), Conservatory (event hall), The Garden (outdoor venue for events), etc.

Location: EQ, Equatorial Plaza, Jalan Sultan Ismail, 50250 Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia

Cost: Rs. 12,409.80 per night approx.

Check-In and Check-Out Time: 3:00 p.m. and 12:00 p.m.

Popular Places Nearby: Merdeka Square, Aquaria KLCC, Menara Kuala Lumpur, KLCC Park, Sultan ABdul Samad Building, MinNature Malaysia, Golden Triangle, KL Bird Park, Kolam Biru, Plaza Tugu Negara, Bukit Bintang, Sky Deck KL Tower, Kuala Lumpur City Gallery, etc.

Shangri-La Kuala Lumpur

Whether you are in Kuala Lumpur for business or leisure, this accommodation in Kuala Lumpur has an extensive range of facilities and services designed to give the utmost comfort and convenience. If you choose Shangri-La Kuala Lumpur as your urban sanctuary, you can easily access the iconic landmarks of the city while experiencing the pleasure of receiving exceptional quality services.

Facilities Provided: Clinic, conference facilities, hair salon, facilities for the physically challenged, non-smoking rooms, safe deposit box, laundry and valet service, complimentary weekend family activities, foreign exchange counter, 24-hour room service, restaurants and bars, etc.

Location: 11 Jalan Sultan Ismail, Kuala Lumpur 50250 Malaysia

Cost: Rs. 10,157.02 per night approx.

Check-In and Check-Out Time: 2:00 p.m. and 12:00 p.m.

Popular Places Nearby: Aquaria KLCC, Suria KLCC, MinNature Malaysia, Menara Kuala Lumpur, Aquaria KLCC, KLCC Park, Kolam Biru, Sultan Abdul Samad Building, God Bless, Skybridge Petronas Twin Brothers, Victoria Fountain, Graffiti Alley, Plaza Tugu Negara, etc.

Hilton Kuala Lumpur

A part of the Hilton Hotels & Resorts hotel chain, Hilton Kuala Lumpur is a luxury hotel in the Kuala Lumpur Sentral area. If you long to experience an inviting and serene environment, the contemporary design that underlines the luxurious atmosphere will resonate with you. You will also appreciate the efficient staff of Hilton Kuala Lumpur, who are famous for their friendly services.

Facilities Provided: On-site restaurant, room service, outdoor pool, fitness centre, spa, executive lounge, meeting rooms, concierge, EV charging, connecting rooms,

Location: 3 Jalan Stesen Sentral, Kuala Lumpur, 50470 Malaysia

Cost: Rs. 8,862.06 per night approx.

Check-In and Check-Out Time: 3:00 p.m. and 12:00 p.m.

Popular Places Nearby: Petronas Twin Towers, Aquaria KLCC, Sunway Lagoon Theme Park, Kuala Lumpur Tower, Batu Caves, Petaling Street Market, Putra Mosque, National Mosque of Malaysia, Genting Highlands, Merdeka Square, The National Museum of Malaysia, etc.

The RuMa Hotel and Residences

RuMa is a luxury hotel at the heart of the city's Golden Triangle. An accomplished host is behind its successful running as it continues to encapsulate all the intimacy and comfort you will get in your home. A stay at the RuMa will encourage you to uncover Kuala Lumpur's origins and ancient heritage in a luxurious and modern setting that emanates the soothing nature of a deluxe urban resort.

Facilities Provided: UR Spa, infinity pool, gym, Barber at The Ruma By Truefitt & Hill, restaurants and bar, rooms for meetings and events, wedding halls, etc.

Location: The RuMa Hotel and Residences, 7 Jalan Kia Peng, 50450 Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia

Cost: Rs. 18,310.21 per night approx.

Check-In and Check-Out Time: 11:00 a.m. and 6:00 p.m.

Popular Places Nearby: KLCC Park, Istana Terengganu, Rumah Penghulu Abu Seman, Merdeka Square, Aquaria KLCC, MinNature Malaysia, Kolam Biru, Menara Kuala Lumpur, KL Bird Park, Kuala Lumpur Butterfly Park, Istana Siraj, Sultan Abdul Samad Building, etc.

Best Family-Friendly and Couple-Friendly Hotels in Kuala Lumpur

Are you curious if the above options will cater well to your partner or family? Explore these hotels renowned for fostering quality family moments or intimate time with your spouse.

Lanson Place Bukit Ceylon

Lanson Place Bukit Ceylon is an ideal option if you are looking for a home-like comfort at the heart of the Golden Triangle. This hotel offers some of the most capacious serviced accommodations in Kuala Lumpur. It has fitting amenities for couples or families with kids to relax or enjoy their time, accompanied by extraordinary city views.

Facilities Provided: 163 lounges, outdoor swimming pool, kids' playground, gym, 24-hour reception, e-concierge, limousine, laundry and dry cleaning, babysitting, housekeeping services, etc.

Location: 10, Jalan Ceylon, Bukit Ceylon, 50200 Kuala Lumpur, Wilayah Persekutuan Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia

Cost: Rs. 8,676.95 per night approx.

Check-In and Check-Out Time: 2:00 p.m. and 12:00 p.m.

Popular Places Nearby: Batu Caves, National Mosque, Central Market, Petronas Twin Towers, Menara Prestige, Menara Hap Seng, Merdeka Square, Old KL Railway Station, Chinatown, Sunway Lagoon, Perdana Botanic Garden, Aquaria KLCC, Pavilion Kuala Lumpur, etc.

Sunway Resort Hotel

Sunway Resort Hotel is Asia's leading entertainment and premier hospitality destination. It welcomes its guests with geniality and the assurance of creating outstanding and lifelong memories. Whether you are indulging in shopping at Sunway Pyramid shopping mall, enjoying rides at Sunway Lagoon theme park, or tasting Gordon Ramsay Bar & Grill's world-class offerings at Sunway Resort Hotel, wonderful experiences are very close by.

Facilities Provided: Waterventure (a childrenâ€™s play zone), Wonderland (Kidâ€™s Club), swimming pool, health club, 20th Club for business travellers, premium leisure lounge, Sunway Medispa, workshops on urban farming, etc.

Location: Sunway Resort, Persiaran Lagoon, Bandar Sunway, 47500 Selangor Darul Ehsan, Malaysia

Cost: Rs. 11,353.11 per night approx.

Check-In and Check-Out Time: 3:00 p.m. and 12:00 p.m.

Popular Places Nearby: Kuala Lumpur City Centre, Muzium Negara, River of Life, Thean Hou Temple, Zoo Negara, Butterfly Park, Merdeka Square, KL Tower, Tugu Negara, Masjid Negara, Bukit Bintang, central Market, GBatu Caves, etc.

InterContinental Kuala Lumpur

InterContinental can be your best gateway to Kuala Lumpur with its exceptional services and amenities. You can intensify your day in the city with a workout at their fitness centre, taking a dip at the swimming pool, tasting culinary delights at their restaurants, and relaxing at their spa. Whether you are in this hotel with your family or partner, you can expect a complete and immersive experience at this five-star hotel.

Facilities Provided: Sompoton Spa, fitness centre, outdoor pool, business centre, secretarial services, shoe shine, wellness activities, same day dry cleaning, dry cleaning, pickup/laundry valet, restaurant, etc.

Location: 165, Jln Ampang, Kuala Lumpur, 50450 Kuala Lumpur, Wilayah Persekutuan Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia

Cost: Rs. 7,613.85 per night approx.

Check-In and Check-Out Time: 2:00 p.m. and 12:00 p.m.

Popular Places Nearby: Petronas Twin Towers, Aquaria KLCC, Royal Selangor Visitors Centre, KL Bird Park, Central Market, Petaling Street / Chinatown, Independence Square (Dataran Merdeka), Menara Kuala Lumpur, Bukit Nanas Forest Reserve & KL Tower, Batu Caves, etc.

Wrapping It Up!

Now that you know more about magnificent hotels in Kuala Lumpur, you can choose the ideal lodging in advance of your trip. Selecting the best hotel is essential to making treasured moments and getting the most out of your vacation.

It is worth mentioning that it is imperative for you to obtain comprehensive travel insurance for the vacation, as it will offer financial security in the event of any emergencies that may arise. It will spare you from having to pay for any out-of-pocket expenses during a medical, legal, or travel-related emergency.

Prepare for an enchanted journey in Kuala Lumpur by booking accommodations and packing your belongings!
